short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A habit tracker for IndieHackers in your NewTab page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the most important metric for any IndieHacker. Connect your Github account, see your Github Contributions chart directly in your NewTab. Track X.com engagements and set custom goals.
